description:
Nová aplikace CREDITAS One spojuje do jednoho moderního a bezpečného mobilního bankovnictví vše, co chcete.

CREDITAS One je nová mobilní aplikace, která spojuje všechny vaše oblíbené bankovní služby do jednoho moderního a bezpečného prostředí. Přinášíme rychlou, přehlednou a spolehlivou aplikaci dostupnou 24/7.

 Co v aplikaci najdete?
 •  Přehled všech produktů na jednom místě
Sledujte a spravujte své produkty, včetně disponentských, přehledně v jedné aplikaci.

 •  Okamžité upozornění na pohyby na účtu a kartách
Získejte přehled o všech transakcích díky notifikacím v reálném čase.

 •  Rychlé platby a platby přes QR kód
Plaťte pohodlně – podporujeme okamžité platby i platby pomocí QR kódu. V aplikaci zadáte také trvalé příkazy, inkasa, SIPO a SEPA platby.

 •  Jednoduchá správa karet
Mějte karty pod kontrolou: nastavujte limity, požádejte si o novou nebo zablokujte stávající kartu.

 •  Možnosti spoření 
Založte si spořicí účet nebo termínovaný vklad a zhodnocujte své peníze přímo z aplikace.

 •  Zakládání nových produktů online
Nový účet nebo jiný produkt založíte snadno na pár kliknutí.

 •  Výpisy a šablony pohromadě
Vše potřebné máte vždy po ruce – bezpečně uložené a kdykoliv dostupné.

Kontakt s bankou
•  Z aplikace můžete kdykoli jednoduše poslat zprávu bance. 
 
Bezpečnost je pro nás prioritou
Pro přihlášení do aplikace i potvrzení jakékoliv akce je potřeba zadat MPIN nebo použít biometrické ověření (otisk prstem, odemykání obličejem). V případě potřeby lze aplikaci deaktivovat přes internetové bankovnictví.
 
Objevte všechny funkce a stáhněte si CREDITAS One.

SIMPLE TO USE
Track all your services in one user-friendly app. You can easily order and manage individual services.

PLANS
Choose a plan that fits your lifestyle. A plan is a set of products and services for everyday banking, which includes an account, a card, payments, and ATM withdrawals.


MULTICURRENCY ACCOUNT
Use multiple currencies in one account. You can exchange money within your account in a few seconds and simply pay in the local currency abroad, wherever you go.


CHOOSE YOUR OWN ACCOUNT NUMBER AND NAME IT
Set your own account number, for example, your birthday or wedding anniversary. You can name the account whatever you like.


SAVINGS ACCOUNT AND ENVELOPES
Open a savings account online and have up to 10 savings envelopes. Organize your money into envelopes for whatever you need.


CARD ORDERING AND MANAGEMENT
In KB+ you can order, unlock, and lock a card or view the PIN. Choose one of the designs offered and add your card to Apple Pay.


KB KLÍČ IS NOW PART OF KB+
You no longer need 2 apps to verify payments and logins. Now you can do everything in the KB+ app.


DRAG AND DROP PAYMENTS
Move money quickly and easily between your accounts and savings envelopes with a simple drag and drop.


TOUCH ID AND FACE ID
Make app login and payment verification easier with Touch ID or Face ID. Just use your finger or scan your face.


3D TOUCH
Long press the KB+ app icon on your mobile to choose from the most used features.


SPOTLIGHT
Explore the ability to search KB+ app features through Spotlight.


BUILDING SAVINGS
Get state support of up to 2,000 CZK per year and enrich your savings with a guaranteed interest rate for 6 years.


EXTRA SERVICE CESTOVÁNÍ
Insure yourself against unexpected events on the road. With the extra service Cestování, you won't be caught off guard by a traffic accident, lost luggage, or a trip cancellation. The service is valid all year round.


SUPPLEMENTARY PENSION SAVINGS
Save and invest for retirement. In KB+, you can now arrange a pension not only for yourself, but for your child too. In addition, your child can collect a third of their own contributions from the age of 18.


CHILDREN'S SAVINGS ACCOUNT
Save for your child with a great interest rate. You can open an account via the application. Additionally, your child can manage their own account from the age of 6, and from 15, they can open an account on their own.


PLAN FOR ENTREPRENEURS
Open and manage your business account in the app. Share access to it with managers or your accountant. With higher-level plans, you also get a multicurrency account for free.

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

About XTB
XTB is a global financial institution trusted by over 1.7 million clients. We provide access to a wide range of investment options including stocks, ETFs,CFD trading on currencies, commodities, indices, and more. Our platform also includes Investment Plans, interest on uninvested funds and ISA. All of this is available in one easy-to-use app — a single, powerful ecosystem where your money works.

Buy stocks and ETFs commission-free
The XTB app gives you access to over 4500 stocks and ETFs from 16 major exchanges around the world. Invest in stocks and ETFs with 0% commission.*

Choose from thousands of CFDs
Trade CFDs based on currency pairs (Forex), commodities, indices, stocks, and ETFs.

Make the most of our savings solutions:

Investment Plans
At XTB, you can create a personalised Investment Plan that will help you regularly set aside small amounts, invest passively and reach your desired goals, like: travel, retirement, or a new house.

Interest on free funds
You can profit while waiting for the perfect investment opportunity. All your uninvested funds earn interest.

Flexible Stocks & Shares ISA
An ISA  is a tax-efficient savings and investment account that allows you to earn interest or returns without paying tax on them.

2FA - an extra layer of security
We implemented 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) through SMS verification to ensure that no one gains unauthorized access to your XTB account. 

Safe and secure deposits and withdrawals
Make a deposit instantly by credit/debit cards like Visa/Mastercard. Easily transfer funds between sub-accounts within XTB or withdraw to your personal bank account - all safely and securely. 

24h/5 support
Our customer service team offers support in 18 languages and is available 24/5 hours a day,  via email, chat or phone.

Free demo account
Open a free demo account in seconds and explore your investment ideas with zero risk. Experience real market conditions without using your own capital. When you’re ready, open a real  XTB account for free and start putting your money to work for real.

Trainings and webinars
Explore our extensive video library and gain access to hundreds of hours of educational webinars. Learn at your own pace with clear, structured content . 

Market news and analysis
Get breaking news and read professional market analysis from our award-winning research team.

Advanced charts and technical analysis
Find the best investment opportunities using over 35 indicators, different chart types, advanced technical analysis, and other features in the app.

Additional investing tools
Stay ahead with our suite of investing tools: track key macroeconomic events with the Economic Calendar, manage risk and plan using the Investor’s Calculator, set real-time Price Alerts to catch market moves and explore global Market Sentiment to make more informed decisions.

*For monthly turnover up to 100,000 EUR. Transactions above this limit will be charged a commission of 0.2% (minimum 10 GBP).
**CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 
72% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider.
You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Your capital is at risk. The value of your investments may go up or down.Tax treatment depends on your individual circumstances and ISA regulations which may change.T&Cs apply.

Join 3 million users taking care of their finances with George
The George app gives you a clear overview of your income, expenses, investments, and insurance anytime, anywhere. Access all your financial information quickly and easily, right at your fingertips.

Key features: 
• Manage your money: Track your income and expenses, set payment reminders, and adjust card limits. 
• Keep your money safe: Easily block lost cards, view your PIN, or withdraw cash from an ATM via a QR code. Verify via app that it’s really us calling you. 
• Ultra fast payments: Make instant payments to local banks, pay bills via QR codes, and set up standing orders. 
• Save money and get discounts: Earn cashback with the Moneyback program. Offers change regularly. 
• Invest easily: Invest in ETFs, funds, stocks, or even partial shares, and track their performance directly in the app. 
• Apply for products: Choose from over 50 products, including credit cards or insurance, right in the app. 

Your financial health partner 
George is your personal guide to better financial management. It helps you save on specific expenses and even shows you how to earn extra money, like through government benefits. Let George guide you through your finances and stay financially FIT with just a few clicks.

Seamless payments 
Add your card to Apple Pay and enjoy quick, secure payments with your phone or watch – online and in stores.

Child-friendly banking 
George for Kids is George specifically designed for children up to their 15th birthday. Teach them how to tak care of their financial health with George and get it for them for free, with their own account – and from age 8, even with a card. As a cherry on top, George offers playful financial tips tailored to your child's age.
 
George does so much more. Try it today! Download the app, set up your free account, and join those who earned an extra 8,235 CZK on average last year.

Your Česká spořitelna

With ČSOB Smart you have the whole bank and insurance company in your mobile.

You are not a client yet? It is not a problem, you can become one right in the app – opening a current account takes only few minutes. 

Why it is great to have ČSOB Smart:
 
1. Your money is safe, it is protected not only by your bank identity, but also by Face ID or Touch ID. 

2. You always know how much money you have, both in your current and savings account, and even on investments account. 

3. It makes payments easy, even invoice payment, thanks to the possibility to scan it from a QR code. 

4. You have a perfect control of accounts, mortgages, loans, insurance and other ČSOB products. 

5. You can change your card limit, display forgotten PIN code, or temporarily lock the card, and it all takes no time. 

6. It allows you to easily arrange a loan, savings, investments, travel insurance and other products. 

7. Here you may manage your insurance contracts, report an insurance event and monitor its handling progress. You can also find here your insurance documents, such as your Green Card.

8. You can customize it according to your needs, adjust the order of the products or set the dark mode of an app. 

And that's not all! You can explore more features after downloading it.

S mobilním bankovnictvím od Raiffeisenbank máte své finance v bezpečí a pod kontrolou. Jen posuďte sami.

RYCHLÉ A BEZPEČNÉ PŘIHLÁŠENÍ
Při aktivaci si nastavte vlastní S-PIN, kterým se budete přihlašovat a autorizovat všechny platby a operace. Jednoduše se přihlásíte a potvrdíte platby do 5000 Kč i pomocí Face ID nebo Touch ID.

VŠECHNY PRODUKTY NA JEDNOM MÍSTĚ
Na hlavní stránce naleznete základní přehled a informace o všech svých produktech a službách.

NEKONEČNÁ HISTORIE POHYBŮ
Všechny platby a karetní transakce naleznete ve Vaší transakční historii ihned po jejich provedení. Pro lepší orientaci většina obsahuje i logo obchodníka a má přiřazenou kategorii.

JEDNODUCHÉ DOMÁCÍ PLATBY
Nevyplňujte složité formuláře. Příjemce vyberte ze seznamu těch nejčastějších. Nebo použijte QR kód pro jednodušší vyplnění parametrů platby. Platbu mezi vlastními účty můžete provést tak, že na hlavní stránce podržíte prst na jednom z účtů a přetáhnete jej na jiný účet.

MÁTE PŘEHLED, ZA CO NEJVÍC UTRÁCÍTE
Nejen ke karetním transakcím automaticky přiřazujeme jejich kategorie. Kompletní přehled výdajů v jednotlivých kategoriích za daný měsíc si pak můžete zobrazit v přehledném grafu.
A to zdaleka není všechno, co naše aplikace umí. Nevěříte? Tak si ji stáhněte a přesvědčte se sami.

Aplikace My Air přináší mobilní bankovnictví Air Bank a dělá život s penězi jednodušší. Ladíme a plníme ji chytrými funkcemi tak, aby vám peníze dělaly co nejméně starostí, a naopak přinášely radost. Možná zjistíte, že vás bankování s ní dokonce baví. 
Už na úvodní obrazovce s Chytrým přehledem vidíte, kolik máte na účtech nebo jak to vypadá s vaší půjčkou. Nejpoužívanější funkce najdete rovnou pod palcem. 
Bezpečí vašich peněz je jasně na prvním místě. I proto máte svoje karty pěkně po ruce a vše, co se na nich šustne, jednoduše pod kontrolou. Třeba limity plateb změníte v mžiku i při čekání u pokladny. 
Jak se vám daří vyjít do příští výplaty? Z grafu rychle poznáte, zda se pochválit nebo je potřeba přibrzdit.   
Platit s námi se ale vyplatí. Můžeme vám totiž vrátit třeba 10 800 Kč za rok díky spoustě odměn a výhod. V aplikaci si jednoduše zapnete ty, které se vám hodí. Včetně exkluzivních výhod pro členy Unity. 
Přemýšlíte, co podniknout se svými úsporami? Klidně se s námi vydejte do světa investic, rádi vás provedeme klik za klikem.  
Učit se hospodařit u nás můžou i děti už od 8 let. S dětskou verzí aplikace to zvládnou hravě. A ta radost, když si naspoří na svoje sny.  
Mohli bychom psát dál a dál o spoustě vychytávek, které v aplikaci najdete. Ale tisíckrát lepší je si ji stáhnout a vyzkoušet. Ať se vám líbí.

The ČSOB Smart Key will make it easier for you to log in and confirm payments in internet banking, as well as card payments in e-shops, or remote verification when calling the Infoline or a bank branch. You don't have to wait for a confirmation SMS and then rewrite the code from it. With the Smart Key, notifications will pop up immediately and you will confirm the request with a Face ID, fingerprint, or numerical PIN.


Why to use ČSOB Smart Key application:
• Conveniently log in and confirm the payment in internet banking
• Easily confirm card payments on the Internet
• The app can verify you remotely when calling the Infoline or bank branch
• You can use a Face ID or fingerprint instead of a numerical PIN
• Authentication complies with bank-grade security standards 
• Being offline is not a problem: app works also offline for confirming transactions in internet banking
• A map of branches and ATMs is a part of the app
• You can install it on both your mobile phones and tablets

After downloading, simply activate the application in internet banking.

For more information visit page https://www.csob.cz/smartkey

V mobilní aplikaci Home Credit máte finance pod kontrolou kdykoliv a kdekoliv. Najdete v ní vše ke své půjčce, konsolidaci i nákupu na splátky. Pod palcem máte splácení, pohyby na účtu i další čerpání. Pro bezpečné placení tam na vás čeká virtuální karta. 
Do aplikace se jednoduše přihlásíte kódem, otiskem prstu nebo rozpoznáním obličeje. Vybrat si můžete světlý nebo tmavý režim, který je šetrný pro vaše oči.
Vyzkoušejte aplikaci ještě dnes a dejte nám vědět, jak se vám líbí.



Jednoduché splácení a údaje o splátce
Ihned po přihlášení vidíte aktuální stav i termín splátky. Odeslání splátky vyřídíte na pár kliknutí přes ikonu své banky nebo pomocí QR kódu. Číslo účtu, částku a variabilní symbol vyplníme za vás.



Měsíční výpisy v digitální podobě
Šetříme naši přírodu. V aplikaci najdete na jednom místě výpisy za posledních 12 měsíců.



Okamžitý převod peněz
Stačí pár kliknutí v aplikaci a peníze putují na váš bankovní účet. Využít můžete i platbu přes QR kód. Když potřebujete víc, můžete si požádat o navýšení úvěrového rámce.



Virtuální karta pro bezpečné placení
Kartu vám vydáme obratem přímo v aplikaci. Než vyrazíte do obchodu nebo bankomatu, přidejte si virtuální kartu do Peněženky Google nebo Apple. V aplikaci si bezpečně zobrazíte údaje karty a potvrdíte online nákupy. V případě potřeby vyřešíte blokaci nebo změnu limitů.



Pohyby na účtu za celou historii
V historii transakcí vidíte přehledně všechny své nákupy, převody i splátky.



Příklad úvěru, který může být nabízen v mobilní aplikaci
Ilustrativní výpočet dle zákona pro revolvingový úvěr: Výše úvěru 80 000 Kč, roční úroková sazba 15,9 %, RPSN 17,1 %, celkem zaplatíte 86 890 Kč. Jednotlivé po sobě jdoucí měsíční splátky: 7 727 Kč, 7 638 Kč, 7 550 Kč, 7 462 Kč, 7 373 Kč, 7 285 Kč, 7 197 Kč, 7 108 Kč, 7 020 Kč, 6 932 Kč, 6 843 Kč a 6 755 Kč. Splátky a částka, kterou celkem zaplatíte, jsou matematicky zaokrouhleny. Uvedené hodnoty platí za předpokladu čerpání celé výše úvěru okamžitě, bezhotovostně, v plné výši, při výše uvedené úrokové sazbě a bez poplatku, při poskytnutí revolvingového úvěru na období jednoho roku a splacení ve 12 měsíčních splátkách se stejnou výší jistiny. Nabídka nezohledňuje další čerpání úvěru ani využití doplňkových služeb.


Nabídkou nevzniká nárok na poskytnutí úvěru. Každou žádost o čerpání úvěru posuzujeme individuálně, může se od prezentované lišit, a maximální výše RPSN nepřesáhne 31,8 %. 
Flexibilní půjčka je revolvingový úvěr. To znamená, že smlouva o úvěru je uzavřena na dobu neurčitou a klient může úvěr opakovaně čerpat až do výše nevyčerpaného úvěrového rámce. Pokud klient dlužnou částku splatí, může úvěrový rámec znovu využít v celém rozsahu.

S aplikací Moje Generali budete mít dokonalý přehled o svém pojištění kdykoliv potřebujete.

Co se vám může hodit

• Přehled o smlouvách, platbách a nahlášených škodách
• Informace o tom, co a na kolik máte pojištěné
• Rychlé nahlášení škody a sledování průběhu vyřízení
• Možnost zavolat si asistenci v nouzi na pár kliknutí
• Zelená karta dostupná i offline

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Účty, investice, hypotéky, pojistky .. u nás nebo jinde, prostě všechno v jedné apce. Jednoduše, přehledně a bezpečně.


Finance pod palcem
V apce vyřešíte všechno. Úplně všechno.


Balíček pro jednoho se vším všudy
Nejen účet, karty, spoření, platby i výběry z bankomatů zdarma. Ale i pojistky, investice nebo třeba účty v jiných bankách v jedné apce. A co ještě nemáte, jednoduše v ní srovnáte i sjednáte. Nebo vám pomůže váš osobní poradce Partners. Prozkoumejte balíček pro jednoho.


Připojte, co chcete

Od účtů v jiné bance po papírové pojistky z šuplíku.


Žádné papírování
Od zřízení po zrušení účtu, podepisování smluv nebo potvrzení. Vše na ťuknutí.


Správa karet
Zřídit kartu, zmrazit kartu, změnit PIN a nebo limity? Ale jistě.


Srovnat a sjednat
Srovnání a sjednání třeba pojištění auta, majetku nebo dovolené na dosah.


Investiční reporting
Neustálý přehled o tom, jak se daří Vašim investicím, ať už jste investovali jednorázově, nebo investujete pravidelně.

Aircash is a multi-currency digital wallet and issuer of the Aircash Mastercard card.

With Aircash, users can top up instantly and easily with cash or any credit/debit card. Withdraw money at any ATM, point of sale of Aircash partners or bank account. Send to friends or family, pay for various services, buy telecom and digital vouchers and top up numerous online accounts.
With Aircash, you have full control over your money – fast, easy, and always available. With the Aircash Wallet and Aircash Prepaid Mastercard, you have worldwide flexibility, whether online, in stores, or at ATMs.

AIRCASH MASTERCARD
Get the Aircash Mastercard at our retail locations or through Amazon and use it at over 30 million locations worldwide. The card is managed directly through your Aircash Wallet – simply load it and get started!

DEPOSIT
Instantly and fee-free, load funds to your Aircash Wallet with cash at more than 200,000 retail locations or with any credit/debit card.

MONEY TRANSFER
Send money to friends and family, no matter where they are. The funds are available in seconds in their Aircash Wallet in their currency.

SERVICES
Buy tickets, pay bills, get vouchers, and top up online accounts – all in one app.

WITHDRAWAL
No problem – use your Aircash Mastercard at ATMs worldwide or withdraw cash from your Aircash Wallet at selected retail locations.

Get the Aircash app now and enjoy all the everyday benefits Aircash has to offer!

The KB Klíč app verifies your identity and safely logs you into MojeBanka online banking and Komerční banka's other online apps. You don't have to enter a texted code and you also authorise payments through the app.
 
You need the following for KB Klíč activation:
- KB ID, which you will find in the Electronic Signature Agreement. You can also use your username/email
- An activation code that you will receive at a KB branch or when you log into mujprofil.kb.cz otherwise than via KB Klíč
 
The activation guide is available at https://www.kb.cz/en/faq-and-support/how-to-sign-in
 
Set the PIN on the occasion of activation. You can set up your fingerprint if your phone supports them. Komerční banka will never see your fingerprints; they are retained in a secure repository in the phone.
 
If your phone is connected to the internet the request to confirm the activation will be received automatically in your phone. Check and confirm the request. If offline, select 'The device is not connected to the internet' option in your computer. Using the KB Klíč app, scan the pictorial code from the computer's screen. Then confirm the code by the PIN or fingerprint. Finally, type the generated code in your computer.
 
Please note: If you enter an incorrect PIN five times KB Klíč blocks access. You will then activate the apps using an activation code that you will receive in an ATM, at a KB branch or after logging into mujprofil.kb.cz otherwise than via KB Klíč.
 
KB Klíč will not work for you if you have reinstalled software on your phone and your platform (root) is therefore not protected. All of this for the sake of security.

Smart Banka app is a free mobile banking app which offers quick and easy way to manage your bank accounts from your phone. You can open our Tom checking account without the need to visit one of our branches. You will have easy access to our services, check your balance, make payments, top up your credit, or find the nearest branch. You can log in using a PIN or via Touch ID. Your PIN will also be used to confirm payment orders which eliminates the need for mobile confirmation. Both downloading and using the app is completely free of charge.  
 
How to?
Download the app from your App Store, pair with your Internet Banka using the instructions within the app, and start using it. 

Is it safe? 
Yes. Digital attacks are very complicated. Logging into the app and payment orders are protected by 4-8 digit PIN number which only you know. Smart Banka also uses encrypted communication with the bank servers. 

What will you find in the Smart Banka app? 
• Option to open a checking account without visiting our branch
• All your current balances including Bene+
• Transactions
• Payment orders
• Option to use a payment template or a QR code
• Notices about unpaid bills and overdue payments
• Map of ATMs with the option to filter out direct deposit ATMs
• Credit top up
• Temporary or immediate card blocking or unblocking in case of theft or loss
• Changing card limits 
• Overview of your loans
• Your investment product development 
• Current exchange rates 
• Managing user accounts (private, company, or eDisponent)

Už žádné složitosti. Vše s pojišťovnou vyřešíte jednoduše v naší appce. Nafotíte přes ni i auto pro havarijní pojištění.
 
Smlouvy pod kontrolou
Koukněte, co máte pojištěné, měňte, upravujte, stornujte. Vše jednoduše online.
 
Platby pod palcem
Mějte přehled o platbách, dostávejte upozornění, plaťte přímo z appky.
 
Cestovní pojištění po ruce
Využijte asistenční kartičku v mobilu, připojišťujte si rizikové sporty, kdy potřebujete.
 
Nafoťte auto pro havarijní pojištění
V appce sami nafotíte auto pro havarijní pojištění, aniž byste museli kamkoliv jezdit. Rychle a pohodlně.
 
Zelená karta v mobilu
V Česku už nemusíte vozit vytisknutou zelenou kartu. Mějte ji vždy po ruce jednoduše v mobilu a nasdílejte ji i ostatním členům rodiny.
 
Jednoduché přihlášení
Přihlašujte se jednoduše otiskem prstu. Už žádné zadávání PINu. Nebo využijte FaceID.
 
Asistence vždy po ruce
Máte přehled o vašich asistencích a přímo z appky zavoláte pomoc. Na mobilu uvidíte, jak se k vám blíží. Je to snadné jako objednání taxíka.
 
Sjednání pojištění na pár kliků
Sjednání cestovka, autopojištění i pojištění majetku zvládnete jednoduše v appce za pár minut. A pojištění vám platí hned, jak zaplatíte.

V Directu vyřešíte vše online nebo po telefonu na 221 221 221.

Sídlíme v Brně (Nové sady 996/25, 602 00) a Praze (Pod Dráhou 1636/1, 170 00)

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Mějte své finance stále pod kontrolou a v bezpečí zároveň. Mobilní aplikace od mBank skloubila nejpokročilejší bezpečností systémy s uživatelsky přívětivým prostředím. Správa peněz ještě nikdy nebyla vymakanější. 
Jak vám mobilní aplikace od mBank usnadní život?
1.	Přehled o svých financích budete mít stále po ruce – díky notifikacím se hned dozvíte o každém pohybu na účtu. 
2.	Otevře vám cestu do světa mobilních plateb – s bankovnictvím v mobilu vám k bezkontaktním platbám stačí telefon a palec nebo chytré hodinky. 
3.	Převod peněz bude otázkou pár kliknutí – uskutečníte jej snadno a rychle pomocí QR kódů nebo mobilních čísel. 
4.	Online platby se stanou ještě bezpečnější – k jejich potvrzení použijete mKlíč, který chrání váš unikátní PIN nebo biometrie. 
5.	Usnadní vám správu platebních karet – nastavení limitů, změny PINu nebo rychlého zablokování karty.
6.	Zpřístupní vám výhody virtuálních karet – eKartu si snadno objednáte přímo v aplikaci. 
7.	Umožní vám sjednání půjčky, spoření, pojištění a dalších bankovních produktů – předschválenou půjčku můžete mít na účtu do 3 minut.
Co se bezpečnosti týče, jsme nekompromisní
Bezpečnost vašich financí je pro nás prioritou. Proto mobilní aplikaci od mBank chrání ty nejpokročilejší funkce.
•	Přihlášení a každý úkon vyžaduje vámi vybraný unikátní PIN nebo ověření pomocí otisku prstu, případně obličeje.
•	Při odcizení telefonu aplikaci odpojíte skrz internetové bankovnictví.
•	Díky pokročilým šifrovacím protokolům nikdo nezneužije vaše hesla, PINy ani další osobní údaje. 
Ještě nemáte mKonto?
Vyhněte se návštěvám poboček. Bankovní účet od mBank si založíte pohodlně odkudkoli. Stáhněte si mobilní aplikaci mBank a dostaňte své finance pod kontrolu ještě dnes.

Perfect for beginners, or more seasoned traders, Revolut X has the tools to trade and manage your crypto. All available at your fingertips.

Trade in real-time on the crypto exchange, with market orders, or control the price you buy with limit orders. Explore 400+ available pairs to get the most from your trades, in USD, EUR, or GBP.

Move from crypto to cash and back again without blocks from your bank. There are no limits or barriers when you use Revolut X with your Revolut account. 

With security you can bank on, you can relax knowing the majority of our funds are held in cold storage. We’re trusted by 45+ million to protect £20.9 billion of their money — we’ve got experience at this. Your assets are held 1:1 and never lent out. Our purpose-built defences are constantly monitoring risks, to prevent account takeovers.

Access customer support 24/7, available in 100+ languages — and all our chats are encrypted, so your personal details stay safe.

Not regulated or protected. Value can go down. Tax may be payable on gains

developer: UniCredit Bank Czech Republic and Slovakia, a.s.
description:
With Smart Banking you always have your bank at your fingertips. The application is user-friendly and most of all secure. It enables you to enter payments, create and edit standing orders, pay a credit card, or activate a debit card. Access to the application as well as payment signatures are protected by your PIN code or biometric data (Touch ID / Face ID).

Smart Banking also includes Smart Key, which you can use to authorize payments and other orders entered in Online Banking, both online and offline. In online mode using push notifications and in offline mode by scanning QR codes. You can also easily change your credentials. In case you forget your credentials, you can reset them using a photo of your ID and a selfie video. The application itself will guide you through the reset.

But the application can do many more things!

• Learn about what’s going on in your account after you turn on Push Notifications.
• Have you lost a credit or debit card? You can simply temporarily block and unblock the card for free in the app.
• You can adjust the daily limit for credit and debit card according to your needs.
• Add credit to your mobile phone with a few clicks.
• Check your account balance even without signing into the app with the Widget
• You can also make a payment by scanning a QR code (QR payment).
• In Online Banking you can use the Payment templates and stored Beneficiaries in the Smart Banking application.
• Account statements, statements for credit cards and other documents can be found in Documents.
• Get an instant overview of currency rates.
• Are you searching for an ATM or UniCredit Bank branch? You can quickly find them in the application.


How to activate the app?

We have prepared a simple and unified activation process for you. Simply download the application and activate the application by using your Username and PIN. If you do not have this data, but you are a Client of UniCredit Bank, you can obtain it directly in the application.

All information is at your fingertips with an improved application that has a unified design and functions with the client portal on the web. Simple login with your fingerprint or FaceID. Everything is available whole day and night.

Everything about your contracts - an overview of everything you have insured with us and payments. The possibility of paying the premium with a card, Apple Pay or Google Pay. Entering the mileage for car insurance will make the end of the settlement period easier for you.

Claims - you can monitor the current status of the solution and provide documents that are needed to resolve your claim. You can report the new claim immediately.

Arranging new insurance literally at your fingertips.

Fio Smartbanking je chytrá bankovní aplikace, která vám usnadní život. Díky ní budete mít svůj účet stále po ruce. Hravě vyřešíte nečekané situace a kdykoliv a kdekoliv zkontrolujete pohyby na účtu, rychle zaplatíte nebo promptně změníte limity na platební kartě. Požádáte o půjčku, můžete začít spořit nebo investovat. A mnohem více. 

Maximální bezpečnost

Aplikace je chráněna pro přihlášení i autorizaci transakcí a splňuje nejmodernější bezpečnostní standardy. 

Aktivace i otevření účtu na pár kliků
•	Pokud jste naším klientem, aplikaci si jednoduše stáhnete a propojíte se svým účtem.
•	Pokud ještě naším klientem nejste, účet si v aplikaci rychle a pohodlně založíte. S Bank iD to nezabere víc než pár minut.

Proč Fio Smartbanking
•	Je jednoduchý, rychlý a bezpečný.
•	Je přehledný a spolehlivý.
•	Peníze máte stále pod kontrolou.
•	Přizpůsobíte si ho podle svého.
•	Nabízí vše, co potřebujete pro efektivní správu peněz.

Co aplikace nabízí
-	Možnost vlastního nastavení úvodní obrazovky.
-	Widget se zůstatkem na plochu telefonu.
-	Placení mobilem nebo hodinkami.
-	Okamžité v platby zdarma v CZK i EUR.
-	Placení skenováním QR kódu, složenky nebo čísla účtu.
-	Funkce Zaplať mi - generování QR kódu pro platbu.
-	Platby na kontakt – stačí znát číslo mobilu.
-	Ovládání limitů karet jedním palcem.
-	Zakládání nových účtů a karet.
-	Žádost o kontokorent nebo půjčku.
-	Možnosti spoření a investování.
-	Sjednání cestovního pojištění nebo pojištění ztráty a krádeže.
-	Volba režimu (plný/pasivní/autorizační/pasivní&autorizační). 
-	Autorizovaná komunikace přes Fio servis nebo volání na infolinku z aplikace.

A modern investment application from Raiffeisenbank that allows simple and secure management of your investments.

KEY FUNCTIONALITIES
Raiffeisen Investing app solves all your investment needs. You can invest one-time or regularly in a wide range of investment products. You can choose from more than a thousand of stocks, ETFs, mutual funds and investment certificates.

Mobile apps allow you to conveniently open an investment account and investment contract within 10 minutes, free of charge. In addition to investing, the app offers the option of advanced filtering of selected investment products according to the results of your investment questionnaire. This may be of particular interest to novice investors.

Application is secured by a unique certification tool, which ensures utterly secure and comfortable access to the application. The app can be accessed either by using the 4-digit S-PIN, fingerprint function or facial recognition. The transactions themselves are confirmed in the same way.

FOR WHOM IS THE APP NOW AVAILABLE?
To ensure the proper functioning of the Raiffeisen Investing app, you must be a current account holder at the Raiffeisenbank, and have the current version of Raiffeisen Mobile Banking installed.

You can find out more about the Raiffeisen Investments app at www.rb.cz/raiffeisen-investice.
